casebody.data:
In re ADOPTION OF ANDERSON. No. 448PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 1, 2005. Michael S. Harrell, Raleigh, for Michael Avery.

The following order has been entered on the third motion filed on the 31st day of May 2005 by Petitioner for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioners (Unidentified Adoptive Parents) shall have up to and including the 5th day of July 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of June 2005."
